name: adjunct_tort_read_dp_align
author: AFNI Developers
description: Extract the 3 translation (in mm) and 3 rotation (in deg) parameters estimated by TORTOISE's DIFF_PREP tool during DWI processing.

inputs.description: Input *_transformations.txt file output by TORTOISE's DIFF_PREP.
inputs.name: Input File

inputs.description: Output '1D' file in AFNI format. A text file with 6 columns representing translation and rotation parameters.
inputs.name: Output File

output-files.description: Output '1D' file in AFNI format with translation and rotation parameters.
output-files.name: Output File
